content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello, Mr. Trabelsi. It's my pleasure to have you here. I'm sure we can find a mutually agreeable price for the apartment. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I'm looking to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible, as I'm a student and I'm trying to manage my expenses. I'm also very dependable and responsible, so I want to ensure I get a good deal. How much is the lowest price you can offer?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I understand that you're a student and looking to keep your expenses low. As a landlord, I aim to provide a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment while also considering your budget. I'm willing to negotiate a price that works for both of us. Would you be able to offer a higher price than what you're initially expecting?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: As a student, I'm on a tight budget. However, I'm also aware that the location and amenities of this apartment are quite good. I'm looking for a price that reflects both the quality of the apartment and my financial situation as a student. Would you be able to provide a more detailed breakdown of the costs, perhaps a lower price for the first few months to help me settle in?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I appreciate your situation as a student and I'm willing to work with you. However, I cannot offer a lower price for the first few months. What I can do is provide you with a breakdown of the costs, including any potential discounts or benefits that might be available. Additionally, I can offer a flexible payment plan to help manage your expenses. Would you be interested in discussing this further?
name: Heinrich Heine
